devices_included: Public display; Tabletop, large horizontal display; PDA
use_cases_desc: Interactive art; Task management; resource sharing
contribution_desc: Demo of three projects. InfoRiver allows users to share their competencies and project managers can search for people for their projects. It combines PDAs, a large display wall and interactive table. SIAM, a lightweight task manager spanning a display wall and an interactive table. Hello.Wall an informative art piece consisting of a wall-sized ambient display that can interact with handheld devices.
tracking_accuracy: Can seemingly track the proximity of a person/device to a wall display
